definition: surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: The architectural heritage of the French kings is nowhere as present as in the Loire Valley.
sentences.chinese: 法国国王的建筑遗产，是因为目前无处在卢瓦尔河谷。

sentences.english: Visit medieval castles in Normandy and the Loire Valley.
sentences.chinese: 在诺曼底参观中世纪城堡和卢瓦尔河谷。

sentences.english: near the Chateau de La Loire, quite, well, not far.
sentences.chinese: 挨着卢瓦尔河谷城堡群，很近。

sentences.english: But the Loire is so shallow, paddling is about as far as bathing goes.
sentences.chinese: 但是卢瓦尔河很浅，划船大约只能像洗澡走那么远。

sentences.english: Water is everywhere here between the sea and the Loire itself.
sentences.chinese: 从大海到卢瓦尔河，水漫延在这里的任何地方。

definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), kingdom during medieval period, now region of France
Rhone, river of Switzerland and France/also written 羅納河|罗纳河[Luo2 na4 He2]
Maas or Meuse River, Western Europe
Tiber (river in Italy, the main watercourse of Rome)
Rhone, river of Switzerland and France
Po River, longest river in Italy
